verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> toward the children of Ammon<WH1121>, and prophesy against them<WH5012>:

and say<WH559> unto the children of Ammon<WH1121>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>, Because thou saidst<WH559>, Aha<WH1889>, against my sanctuary<WH4720>, when it was profaned<WH2490>; and against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, when it was made desolate<WH8074>; and against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, when they went<WH1980> into captivity<WH1473>:

therefore <WH5414>, behold, I will deliver thee to the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> for a possession<WH4181>, and they shall set<WH3427> their encampments<WH2918> in thee<WH5414>, and make their dwellings<WH4908> in thee<WH398>; they shall eat thy fruit<WH6529>, and they shall drink<WH8354> thy milk<WH2461>.

And I will make<WH5414> Rabbah<WH7237> a stable<WH5116> for camels<WH1581>, and the children of Ammon<WH1121> a couching-place<WH4769> for flocks<WH6629>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Because thou hast clapped<WH4222> thy hands<WH3027>, and stamped<WH7554> with the feet<WH7272>, and rejoiced<WH8055> with all the despite<WH7589> of thy soul<WH5315> against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>;

therefore <WH5186>, behold, I have stretched out my hand<WH3027> upon thee<WH5414>, and will deliver thee for a spoil<WH957> to the nations<WH1471>; and I will cut thee off<WH3772> from the peoples<WH5971>, and I will cause thee to perish<WH6> out of the countries<WH776>: I will destroy<WH8045> thee<WH3045>; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because<WH3282> that Moab<WH4124> and Seir<WH8165> do say<WH559>, Behold<WH1004>, the house of Judah<WH3063> is like unto all the nations<WH1471>;

therefore <WH6605>, behold, I will open the side<WH3802> of Moab<WH4124> from the cities<WH5892>, from his cities<WH5892> which are on his frontiers<WH7097>, the glory<WH6643> of the country<WH776>, Beth-jeshimoth<WH1020>, Baal-meon<WH1186>, and Kiriathaim<WH7156>,

unto the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924>, to go against the children of Ammon<WH1121>; and I will give<WH5414> them for a possession<WH4181>, that the children of Ammon<WH1121> may not be remembered<WH2142> among the nations<WH1471>.
and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon Moab<WH4124>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because that Edom<WH123> hath dealt<WH6213> against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> by taking<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359>, and hath greatly<WH816> offended<WH816>, and revenged himself upon them<WH5358>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, I will stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> upon Edom<WH123>, and will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from it<WH5414>; and I will make it desolate<WH2723> from Teman<WH8487>; even unto Dedan<WH1719> shall they fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>.

And I will lay<WH5414> my vengeance<WH5360> upon Edom<WH123> by the hand<WH3027> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>; and they shall do<WH6213> in Edom<WH123> according to mine anger<WH639> and according to my wrath<WH2534>; and they shall know<WH3045> my vengeance<WH5360>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because the Philistines<WH6430> have dealt<WH6213> by revenge<WH5360>, and have taken<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359> with despite<WH7589> of soul<WH5315> to destroy<WH4889> with perpetual<WH5769> enmity<WH342>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, Behold<WH5186>, I will stretch out my hand<WH3027> upon the Philistines<WH6430>, and I will cut off<WH3772> the Cherethites<WH3774>, and destroy<WH6> the remnant<WH7611> of the sea<WH3220> coast<WH2348>.

And I will execute<WH6213> great<WH1419> vengeance<WH5360> upon them with wrathful<WH2534> rebukes<WH8433>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>, when I shall lay<WH5414> my vengeance upon them<WH5360>.
